value.title: Power BI Service Principals 101
value.excerpt: Service principals can be very useful when working with Power BI. From Power BI Embedded, to API and PowerShell. value.title: Power BI Tutorial: 4 Ways To Get Data
value.excerpt: In this Power BI tutorial, Adam looks at 4 ways to get data in Power BI. This focuses on Power BI Desktop and the main storage modes - Import, DirectQuery and Live Connections to Analysis Services. If you are new to Power BI, be sure to check out this Power BI Tutorial: 4 ways to get data.   Import (Excel)

value.title: Rounding out the lakehouse with the GOLD layer in Azure Synapse
value.excerpt: We are completing the journey of our lakehouse with our GOLD layer in Azure Synapse. This gives you the table structures you need to start building those amazing reports in Power BI! value.title: Start your Power BI journey with Guy in a Cube
